[Java] Class ZKGrailsPageFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.SiteMeshFilter
      ZKGrailsPageFilter

public class ZKGrailsPageFilter
extends com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.SiteMeshFilter

Extends the default page filter to overide the apply decorator behaviour if the page is a GSP

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Chanwit Kaewkasi

obtainContent

private com.opensymphony.sitemesh.Content obtainContent(com.opensymphony.sitemesh.ContentProcessor contentProcessor, com.opensymphony.sitemesh.webapp.SiteMeshWebAppContext webAppContext, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, javax.servlet.FilterChain chain)
Continue in filter-chain, writing all content to buffer and parsing into returned com.opensymphony.module.sitemesh.Page object. If com.opensymphony.module.sitemesh.Page is not parseable, null is returned.
